name: ChartCollection
description: A collection of all the chart objects on a worksheet.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: count
properties.description: Returns the number of charts in the worksheet.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Gets a chart using its name. If there are multiple charts with the same name, the first one will be returned.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the chart to be retrieved.

methods.name: add
methods.signature: add(type: string, sourceData: string, seriesBy: string)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Represents the type of a chart.

parameters.name: sourceData
parameters.description: The address or name of the range that contains the source data. If an address or a worksheet-scoped name is used, it must include the worksheet name (e.g. "Sheet1!A5:B9").

parameters.name: seriesBy
parameters.description: Specifies the way columns or rows are used as data series on the chart.

methods.name: getItemAt
methods.description: Gets a chart based on its position in the collection.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index value of the object to be retrieved. Zero-indexed.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
